profile.name: Jesse Pinkman
profile.headline: Self-taught chemical production specialist turned master woodworker. Rose from apprentice to independent operator in high-stakes production environment. Now applying precision craftsmanship to woodworking.
profile.executiveSummary: A scrappy, self-taught operator who learned advanced chemical production on the job from one of the most demanding mentors in the field. Despite lacking formal education, demonstrated ability to master complex technical processes, manage distribution operations, and adapt to extreme pressure. Now channeling precision and craft into woodworking, bringing the same obsessive attention to quality that defined his earlier career.

evidence.outcome: Achieved 96% product purity operating independently after 12-month apprenticeship
evidence.description: Developed from zero chemistry knowledge to competent independent operator under Walter White's mentorship

evidence.outcome: Maintained consistent production output of 200 lbs/week as sole operator
evidence.description: Managed full production cycle independently including setup, synthesis, quality testing, and cleanup

evidence.outcome: Designed and built custom wooden box described as 'the finest craftsmanship' by demanding mentor
evidence.description: Created precision joinery piece that earned recognition from Walter White, who praised virtually nothing

evidence.outcome: Built street-level distribution network covering Albuquerque metro area
evidence.description: Recruited and managed 5+ distributors, negotiated territory agreements, and managed customer relationships

evidence.outcome: Expanded distribution from local to regional territory covering 3 states
evidence.description: Scaled distribution operation leveraging product quality reputation and partnership leverage

evidence.outcome: Operated and maintained complex production equipment with 98% uptime
evidence.description: Learned to operate, troubleshoot, and perform basic repairs on industrial equipment without formal training

evidence.outcome: Managed raw material and finished product inventory across multiple locations
evidence.description: Tracked precursor chemicals, production supplies, and finished inventory with accuracy

evidence.outcome: Negotiated distribution terms with partners in high-stakes competitive environment
evidence.description: Secured favorable terms despite limited leverage through combination of product quality and persistence

evidence.outcome: Built and maintained distributor loyalty across volatile market conditions
evidence.description: Maintained relationships through personal connection, reliability, and fair dealing

evidence.outcome: Maintained personal safety record across 500+ production hours in hazardous environment
evidence.description: Followed rigorous safety protocols for handling volatile chemicals and operating dangerous equipment

evidence.outcome: Learned to perform purity testing and reject batches below 96% threshold
evidence.description: Developed quality standards that would have been unthinkable at the start of apprenticeship

evidence.outcome: Applied production precision skills to fine woodworking achieving furniture-grade quality
evidence.description: Transferred attention to detail and process discipline from chemical work to traditional craftsmanship

evidence.outcome: Adapted to 5 completely different operational environments within 2 years
evidence.description: Operated in RV, basement, commercial lab, underground facility, and mobile operations, adapting processes each time

evidence.outcome: Recovered from multiple traumatic experiences to rebuild productive life
evidence.description: Demonstrated extraordinary capacity to endure adversity and emerge with purpose and renewed direction

evidence.outcome: Maintained partner loyalty under extreme duress including threats to personal safety
evidence.description: Refused to compromise colleagues even under severe personal risk

evidence.outcome: Navigated complex and dangerous interpersonal dynamics across criminal and civilian contexts
evidence.description: Applied instinctive social intelligence to assess threats, build alliances, and avoid dangerous situations

evidence.outcome: Applied artistic sensibility to both chemical production and woodworking
evidence.description: Brought creative thinking and aesthetic appreciation to technical disciplines

evidence.outcome: Built genuine relationships with vulnerable individuals others exploited
evidence.description: Demonstrated deep empathy for people struggling with addiction and difficult circumstances

evidence.outcome: Managed cash-based financial operations across distribution network
evidence.description: Tracked revenue, expenses, and distributor payments in cash-intensive business

evidence.outcome: Applied artistic eye to furniture design and finish work
evidence.description: Brought natural aesthetic sensibility to woodworking design

workHistory.title: Independent Craftsman
workHistory.description: Custom woodworking and furniture making. Applying precision craftsmanship skills to create hand-built pieces.

workHistory.title: Production Specialist / Operator
workHistory.description: Apprenticed under leading industry expert. Advanced from trainee to independent operator achieving 96% product quality standard. Managed production operations and distribution logistics.

purpose: I'm done with shortcuts. I build things with my hands now. Real things. Things that last.
